hero_presentation:
Student in 3rd year Bachelor's degree in work-study at SupDeVinci (Rennes).
I contribute within CNSI - S&D to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses, as well as a separate application for managing supplier-side orders.

subsection1.title: Baccalaureate STI2D - SIN Option
subsection1.description: Discovery of programming fundamentals with Arduino and ESP32 boards, small Python projects and introduction to HTML / CSS.

subsection1.title: BTS SIO - SLAM Option
subsection1.description:
Learning JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Java, C#, HTML, CSS, Symfony, SQL. Completion of Symfony projects :
  • Electric Mobility - e-commerce for hoverboards, electric bikes, scooters (everything except final payment)
  • Ciel Bijou - jewelry sales e-commerce

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (4 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Development of 3 pages on an internal business website (accounting) to display maximum information on files.
Technologies : Vue.js / Nuxt / Node.js / Sequelize / PostgreSQL

subsection1.title: Internship at Diluz (8 weeks)
subsection1.description:
Redesign of the intranet to make it more interactive and modernize the design. Subsequently participated in ticketing of the internal accounting application Talenz Toaden.
Technologies : Vue.js / Nuxt / Node.js / Sequelize / PostgreSQL

subsection1.title: Bachelor's Degree in Development
subsection1.description:
Work-study education focused on frontend and backend development, web integration, and business projects.
Current project :
  • Cyna - e-commerce built with React / Vite / Sequelize / MySQL / Node.js

subsection1.title: Work-Study - CNSI / S&D
subsection1.description:
Contributing to the development of a Warehouse Management System for warehouses and a supplier-side order management application.
Technologies : Laravel / MySQL

pokemon.title: Pokémon App
pokemon.description: iOS Pokédex allowing you to view, search and explore details of each Pokémon.

movie.title: Movie Streaming App
movie.description: Streaming application with user management, favorites and local database.

training.title: Training App
training.description: Muscle-focused training tracking application with role management and intelligent program generation.

chess.title: Chess
chess.description: Chess.com reproduction with authentication, real-time matchmaking and live multiplayer games.
